services.title: Our Core Services: Where Strategy Meets Execution

tabs.title: Chief Financial Officer Services
tabs.description: Strategic financial leadership that drives growth. Financial strategy and planning aligned with your business goals. Board-ready financial reporting and analysis. Strategic decision support for major business moves. Risk management and compliance oversight.

tabs.title: Controlling Solutions
tabs.description: Transforming your numbers into stories. Accurate, timely financial reporting you can trust. Monthly financial statements and variance analysis. Cash flow forecasting and management. Internal controls and process optimization. Compliance with GAAP standards and regulatory requirements.

tabs.title: Cash Flow Optimization
tabs.description: Turn cash flow chaos into predictable, positive cash management. Advanced cash flow modeling and forecasting. Working capital optimization strategies. Payment terms negotiation and accounts management. Cash flow crisis prevention and recovery planning.

tabs.title: P&L Analysis & Optimization
tabs.description: Transform your Profit- and loss statement (P&L) from confusion to clarity. Comprehensive profitability analysis by product, service, or division. Cost structure optimization and margin improvement. Revenue stream analysis and enhancement opportunities. Break-even analysis and scenario planning.

tabs.title: Corporate Board Experience
tabs.description: With 25+ years working with multinationals in the U.S., Europe, and Brazil—including service on multiple corporate boards—we bring board-level expertise in strategy, risk, governance, transparency, and ethics. We’ve driven profit growth, strengthened compliance, and led transformations, providing the vision, oversight, and global perspective for sustainable growth.

items.question: How is this different from my current accountant?
items.answer: Your accountant handles compliance and tax filing – essential but backward-looking functions. We provide forward-looking strategic financial leadership, real-time insights, and proactive planning that drives growth.

items.question: What's included in your services?
items.answer: Depending on your needs: monthly financial reporting, cash flow management, strategic planning, budgeting and forecasting, KPI tracking, board presentation support, and access to our network of specialists.

items.question: How quickly will I see results?
items.answer: Most clients see immediate improvements in financial clarity within 30 days. Strategic improvements in cash flow and profitability typically show measurable results within 90 days.

items.question: Is this cost-effective compared to hiring a full-time CFO?
items.answer: An internationally experienced CFO in the US costs $200K-$400K+ annually plus benefits. Our services on demand deliver the same level of expertise and strategic value for a fraction of that investment.

items.question: Do you work with business planning their international expansion?
items.answer: Absolutely. With our international experience and network, we're uniquely positioned to support businesses expanding globally, particularly into Latin American markets.
